1.5.name: Jolly Co-Op Mod
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Local campaign co-op with extended configuration and piggy back riding. You can customize your campaign like your food bar, ability to hold back spears with Survivor/Monk and more!
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Expedition
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: A new gamemode focused on completing challenges, earning points, unlocking new perks and abilities, and permadeath!

1.5.name: Pearl Lexicon
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Adds a new questline starting at Five Pebbles that unlocks the ability to read pearls remotely and reread pearls you've already seen.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine and EnumExtender to be installed

1.5.name: Jolly Co-Op Fixes
1.5.author: SchuhBaum
1.5.desc: Fixes or works around some of the more critical bugs in the Jolly Co-Op mod.
1.5.req: Requires Jolly Co-Op and ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Rain World Drought
1.5.author: The RW Drought Team
1.5.author_ext: Dracentis, Riv Otter, Aurora, Agness, Garrakx, Topicular, Accepting Light Unbound
1.5.desc: An expansion adding four new regions and a new campaign following The Wanderer, a curious and calm slugcat with a deep desire to discover the ancient mysteries around it.

1.5.name: Arid Barrens
1.5.author: Rain World Community
1.5.desc: An expansive wasteland connecting Shoreline and Farm Arrays. This is a community region project developed by many members of the Rain World Discord server.
1.5.req: Requires CustomRegions to be installed. (See Arid Barrens Readme for installation instructions)

1.5.name: Aether Ridge
1.5.author: Kaeporo
1.5.desc: Aether Ridge is a derelict desalination rig to the north of Sky Islands. This massive structure spans over 450 screens. Includes nine arenas, new music, new lore, new creatures, and more.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix, Custom Regions Support, and Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: The Mast
1.5.author: Doggo
1.5.desc: A region consisting of a large transmission spire in the western area of the world. Includes over 250 new screens, creature spawns for all gamemodes, arena unlocks, and some secrets to discover.
1.5.req: Requires CustomRegions, ConfigMachine, EnumExtender, and Custom Assets to be installed. (See README for additional requirements)

1.5.name: The Root 2.0
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: A new region expanding on Subterranean, and The Exterior, with all new rooms. Made to give exploration focused players more Rain World to discover.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix and Custom Regions Support to be installed.

1.5.name: Badlands
1.5.author: FIIIIISH
1.5.desc: The Badlands is a region connecting Farm Arrays and Garbage Wastes. It features many secrets and unlockables, including three new arenas.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Coral Caves
1.5.author: FIIIIISH
1.5.desc: A water-themed region connecting Garbage Wastes and Aether Ridge. Features unlockable arenas and a brand new aquatic lizard.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Regions Support and Aether Ridge to be installed.

1.5.name: Undersea
1.5.author: Wrayk
1.5.desc: A shaded ocean between Shoreline, Shaded Citadel, and The Mast, with a long abandoned location on the seafloor.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Regions Support and The Mast to be installed.

1.5.name: Side House
1.5.author: AndrewFM
1.5.desc: Adds a new region connecting Shoreline, 5P, and Depths. An amalgamation of many of the game's unused rooms. Also includes a couple custom unlockable maps for arena mode.

1.5.name: Underbelly
1.5.author: carrotpudding
1.5.desc: A dark and damp region connecting Outskirts, Shoreline and Farm arrays.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Regions Support and Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: Swamplands
1.5.author: FishSwallower
1.5.desc: A new swampy region that connects Garbage Wastes and Shoreline
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Better Shelters
1.5.author: Tronsx and Thalber
1.5.desc: Replaces all of the shelter rooms in the original game to make the shelters more unique and interesting in their designs.
1.5.req: Requires EnumExtender, Custom Regions, and ConfigMachine to be installed. (See README for additional requirements)

1.5.name: Pyramid Wall
1.5.author: FIIIIISH
1.5.desc: Replaces the Wall subregion with a brand new set of 10 rooms inspired by the old pyramid iterator concept.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Regions Support to be installed.

1.5.name: Easy Mode Modpack
1.5.author: Easy Mode Modpack Group
1.5.desc: A rebalance and overhaul of Rain World's difficulty. Play as The Renegade, a buffed-up combination of the pre-existing slugcats. The journey will be easier.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: Many More Fixes
1.5.author: The More Slugcats Team
1.5.desc: A large batch of bug fixes, quality of life features, and performance enhancements added to the game, ported early from the upcoming More Slugcats Mod.

1.5.name: Wing Cat
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Gives slugcat wings and the ability to fly. Activate the ability by tapping jump while in the air.

1.5.name: The Martyr
1.5.author: The EchoCat Team
1.5.desc: Play as The Martyr, a new character with custom story, gameplay mechanics and abilities. Provides an alternate experience to The Hunter, with less cycles.

1.5.name: The Lancer
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Play as The Lancer, a slugpup with a horn who specializes in melee combat with spears.

1.5.name: Spookcat
1.5.author: Garrakx and Cappin
1.5.desc: Zombifies slugcat and transforms the world into a dark and haunting nightmarescape. Turns your food meter into a health bar.

1.5.name: Automaton
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Play as a machine with an indestructable body but a delicate mind. Though predators pose no threat to your avatar, care must be taken to protect your neurons.
1.5.req: Requires EnumExtender and SlugBase to be installed.

1.5.name: The Drought's Rot
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: Explore a desolate and decaying world in an AU where LTTM never collapsed.
1.5.req: Requires Drought and Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Sporecat
1.5.author: 楓小喵Maplecat, Topicular, MageGi
1.5.desc: Play as a slugcat who specializes in hunting down and feeding on insects.
1.5.req: Requires Enum Extender to be installed.

1.5.name: Electric Cat
1.5.author: Shiro_pb, ZangTang, Turtle, LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: Adds a fourth playable slugcat who has electric abilities.
1.5.req: Requires SlugBase to be installed.

1.5.name: The Nymph
1.5.author: Tyxaar
1.5.desc: Play as a small and nimble slugcat with a focus on outmaneuvering your enemies, at the expense of your abilities requiring a large amount of food to function.
1.5.req: Requires SlugBase to be installed.

1.5.name: The Volatile
1.5.author: Sov_Sam
1.5.desc: This slugcat has a lighter, is made of slime, and has nothing to loose.
1.5.req: Requires SlugBase and Lush Mire (Custom Regions Support) to be installed.

1.5.name: ThiccCat
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Changes slugcat's state depending on the amount of food eaten. On an empty stomach you're fast but weak, on a full stomach you're strong but slow.

1.5.name: KingCat
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Gives you a pair of awkward, out-of-place king vulture tusks to stab stuff with. What more could you want?

1.5.name: Character Pack
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Adds additional characters to Rusty Machine's character selector: Vult, Aquaria, Spirit, and Refractor.
1.5.req: Requires Rusty Machine to be installed.

1.5.name: KarmaAppetite
1.5.author: Dark-Gran
1.5.desc: Modifies the three original slugcats to have some new abilities. Particuarly, you gain progressively stronger abilities when you have high karma and a full stomach.

1.5.name: Fancy Slugcats
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Adds a variety of tools to customize your slugcat, including body proportions, colors, and even custom graphics and assets.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine and Custom Assets to be installed. (Also, PublicityStunt, only if using Partiality)

1.5.name: Custom Tails
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Allows a custom texture, color, and gradient to be added to slugcat tails.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Lizard Customizer
1.5.author: Ratrat44 and Bigabyte
1.5.desc: A ConfigMachine mod that allows customization of lizard attributes and abilities for all lizard types.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Colorfoot
1.5.author: Multiple Authors
1.5.author_ext: Colorfoot by: Topicular, Selective Colors by: Garrakx and Beau, Camo Slugcat by: loderunner, Skittlekat by: Zandra
1.5.desc: Provides a variety of ways of changing slugcat's colors. This is a collection of the old Selective Colors mod, Camocat mod, and Skittlecat mod.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Echocat
1.5.author: Mehri'Kairothep
1.5.desc: Dunks slugcat into the void sea too early, reskinning them into an echo through custom graphics. Includes switchable variant body parts and their greyscale versions, which can be coloured freely.
1.5.req: Requires Fancy Slugcats, Custom Tails, ConfigMachine, and Custom Assets to be installed

1.5.name: Lizardcat
1.5.author: Mehri'Kairothep
1.5.desc: Reskins slugcat into a lizard-mimicking abomination through custom graphics. Includes switchable variant body parts and their greyscale versions, which can be coloured freely.
1.5.req: Requires Fancy Slugcats, Custom Tails, ConfigMachine, and Custom Assets to be installed

1.5.name: RegionCast
1.5.author: Casheww
1.5.desc: A mod and side-app that adds Discord Rich Presence to the game, with support for region packs.

1.5.name: Sharpener
1.5.author: PJB
1.5.desc: Makes the game look better than ever before with sharper upscaling and a native resolution mode.

1.5.name: Slug Senses
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: Adds creature icons to the map, allowing you to see creatures offscreen. This vision however is not as strong as slugcat's actual view. So still take care not to get surprised!

1.5.name: Map Options
1.5.author: SchuhBaum
1.5.desc: Adds options to configure the in-game map, including map zoom, creature symbols, discovered map, instant reveal and layer focus.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Health Bars
1.5.author: ratrat44
1.5.desc: Displays a health bar above all creatures' heads.

1.5.name: Destructive Bombs
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Makes explosions destroy the terrain.

1.5.name: Blood Mod
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: A mod that adds new blood effects to the game, making combat and creature interactions more visceral.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: DungeonWorld
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Randomly mixes around the pipe destinations in every region, making the world unpredictable to navigate, and ever changing.

1.5.name: GateWorld
1.5.author: FIIIIISH
1.5.desc: An add-on to DungeonWorld that makes gate connections randomized as well, so regions are visited in a random order.
1.5.req: Requires DungeonWorld to be installed.

1.5.name: Enemy Randomizer
1.5.author: Mojopoop
1.5.desc: Randomizes the creatures that spawn from all dens in the game, meaning any creature can spawn anywhere.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed. (Also, PublicityStunt, only if using Partiality)

1.5.name: Random Start
1.5.author: Willburd and Garrakx
1.5.desc: Randomizes the shelter that you spawn in when you start a new playthrough.

1.5.name: Rain World Master Quest
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: A new game+ style mod that reorganizes the game's regions, trying to rekindle the feelings of when you first got lost in Rain World.

1.5.name: Rain World Bingo
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: An external bingo application that gives you challenges to complete in your Rain World playthrough.

1.5.name: SainWorld
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: All randomly generated values in the game will now have fixed values.

1.5.name: Beastmaster
1.5.author: Fyre & Zandra
1.5.desc: Allows you to spawn a variety of creatures and items at will, in all game types including story mode and arena. Essentially, sandbox mode everywhere.

1.5.name: Soon™
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Backports the ending cutscenes from Rain World 1.8 into Rain World 1.5.
1.5.req: Requires EnumExtender to be installed.

1.5.name: АЛЬТЕРНАТИВНЫЙ РУСИФИКАТОР
1.5.author: Thalber
1.5.desc: Переводит весь текст игры на русский язык. Исправлены некоторые недочёты предыдущего локализатора, созданного Valdakhar. (Alternative to Valkdakhar's Russian translation patch)
1.5.req: Requires CommunicationModule to be installed.

1.5.name: Мир Ливней (перевод)
1.5.author: valdakhar
1.5.desc: Русский перевод для Rain World. (This mod translates all of the game text into Russian)
1.5.req: Requires CommunicationModule to be installed.

1.5.name: 雨世界汉化包[一般版]
1.5.author: 矛击汉化组
1.5.author_ext: solo race, Harvie Sorroway, NekoYashiki, Anglia, 雷, 烟斗, 本恶, 明神, 霜夏秋冬, 路人甲, Blue Gauze, Reset, topicular
1.5.desc: 将Rain World翻译成中文。 (This mod translates all of the game into Simplified Chinese)
1.5.req: Requires CommunicationModule to be installed.

1.5.name: 한글패치
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: This mod translates the game text into Korean.
1.5.req: Requires CommunicationModule to be installed.

1.5.name: 日本語パッチ
1.5.author: Adult Swim Games
1.5.desc: Port of Rain World PS4 Japanese translation for PC.
1.5.req: Requires CommunicationModule to be installed

1.5.name: NSH Goes for a Walk
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Lets you play the game as the iterator NSH, who has decided to go for a walk.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed. (Also PublicityStunt, only if using Partiality)

1.5.name: InputFix
1.5.author: PJB
1.5.desc: Fixes the game's controller handling, adds rumble support, and other minor improvements like trigger button binding.

1.5.name: Pause Settings
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: Adds volume control sliders to the game's pause menu, so audio can be adjusted without exiting your game session.

1.5.name: VibeWorld
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: Gives each region its own playlist of Rain World songs that play continuously.

1.5.name: Threat Music Replacement
1.5.author: Logical123
1.5.desc: Replaces the in-game threat music with new remixed tracks made by Logical123.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: Downpour
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: A dynamic and configurable weather mod that adds new rain, snow and lightning effects.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: MoodMod
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Adds a day/night cycle effect to all areas in Rain World.

1.5.name: TitleRotation
1.5.author: topicular
1.5.desc: Allows changing Main Menu scene to other ingame scene.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Hotslonk
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Changes the progression of everything in the world so that time only moves forwards while you are in motion.

1.5.name: Line of Sight
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Limits the player's field of view based on the surrounding terrain.

1.5.name: Caecus
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: This mod makes you blind, replacing vision with hearing. You will sense other creatures if they move or make sounds.

1.5.name: The Rot
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: Turns the world into a decaying landscape dominated by Daddies.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Corruptedskirts
1.5.author: Lizardus 321
1.5.desc: Adds a lot of Daddy Long Legs to Outskirts and also changes its ecosystem.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Void World
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Dunks Rain World in the void for a while so that every room in the entire game has the Void Sea's dark, trippy, confusing effect.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: Aqueous Arena Pack
1.5.author: GooGroker
1.5.desc: Adds 4 new levels to enrich your arena experience, all loosely themed around water.

1.5.name: Aurora's Arenas De Naturale
1.5.author: Aurora
1.5.desc: A small package of various arenas, all inspired by natural habitats from all across the Earth. None of the levels are very complex, but they have a nice feel to them.

1.5.name: Arena Plus
1.5.author: Ehsper
1.5.desc: Adds 8 custom arenas, several of which have hazards not found in any vanilla arenas.
1.5.req: Requires Arena Corruption Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Arena Expansion Mod
1.5.author: Dead__Eye
1.5.desc: This mod adds 13 new arenas to the game to fight and experiment in.

1.5.name: Halloweenas 2020
1.5.author: FIIIIISH
1.5.desc: This mod acts as a spiritual succesor to the orginal Halloweenas by Cappin, adding 4 new spooky arenas to the game.

1.5.name: Halloweenas
1.5.author: Cappin
1.5.desc: Adds five new unique halloween arenas to spook up your competitive/sandbox experiences!

1.5.name: Five Pebbles Arena Levels
1.5.author: Dracentis
1.5.desc: Takes three single screen levels from Five Pebbles and adds them as arenas. Complete with broken zero-g, a memory lab, and a gravity distributor.

1.5.name: Daddy Arenas
1.5.author: Finch
1.5.desc: This mod converts several of the base game's pre-existing arenas, giving them Five Pebbles' Rot.
1.5.req: Requires Arena Corruption Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: GrappleWorld
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed and ThreeFingerG
1.5.desc: Adds Grapple Worms to 1-3 locations in every region except Pebbles.

1.5.name: Farm Arrays Wormgrass Terrain
1.5.author: Skilliton
1.5.desc: Edits the Farm Arrays region to make worm grass sections optionally passable with parkour instead of strictly requiring use of the deers.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Spear Rifle
1.5.author: Beau & AndrewFM
1.5.desc: Adds several overpowered rifles to the game that rapid-fire spears and stuff.

1.5.name: Electric Spear
1.5.author: Shiro_pb & LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: This mod adds a chargeable and depletable electric spear to the game.
1.5.req: Requires EnumExtender to be installed.

1.5.name: Crafting
1.5.author: Pirate-Rob
1.5.desc: Adds the ability to craft certain pairs of two items together to make new items.
1.5.req: Requires Publicity Stunt to be installed.

1.5.name: Simplified Moveset
1.5.author: SchuhBaum
1.5.desc: Simplifies the timing on slugcat's advanced moves, making them easier to perform even with slower inputs or reaction times.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: SimplifiedJump
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Adds an additional action button that several of slugcat's advanced movement maneuvers are mapped to.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Omnithrow
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Gives slugcat the ability to throw objects in any direction.

1.5.name: Aim Anywhere
1.5.author: Demonic
1.5.desc: Gives slugcat the ability to throw objects in the direction of the mouse cursor.

1.5.name: KeepThatAwayFromMe
1.5.author: topicular
1.5.desc: A mod that let you ban types of creatures or items.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Biotic Chaos
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: Makes the game much harder on all difficulties by changing creature spawns.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: The Drought's Plague
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: A Biotic Chaos based mod that makes The Drought much harder by changing creature spawns.
1.5.req: Requires Drought and Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: HunterSpawn
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Makes every slugcat have the same creature spawns as The Hunter.

1.5.name: Bash Ability
1.5.author: Dracentis
1.5.desc: Gives slugcat the bash ability from Ori and the Blind Forest. Press jump while near a creature to bash off of them.

1.5.name: Boiling Veins
1.5.author: Sov_Sam
1.5.desc: This mod gives your slugcat boiling blood, which it may spend by using rocks to draw blood, producing explosions.

1.5.name: Wall Pounce
1.5.author: Demonic
1.5.desc: Adds Slugcat's wall pounce ability from Rain World v1.01 back into the game.

1.5.name: Hydrogen Rocks
1.5.author: Dual
1.5.desc: When you throw a rock, it explodes.

1.5.name: SingularStep
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Every time a lineage creature is killed, there is a 100% chance for the lineage to advance to the next step.

1.5.name: Better Behaved Beasts 2.0
1.5.author: Willburd & the one who screams
1.5.desc: Improves Raindeer behavior. Allows you to wiggle in their horns to make them turn around. Also allows modders to use mirobirds and deer in any room they assign them access to.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: ScoreRush
1.5.author: Henpemaz and SapphireWine
1.5.desc: A modified Hunter game mode. Start the game in any shelter, and get as high of a score as you can in only three cycles.

1.5.name: Score Popups
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: Briefly displays a popup for the amount of points a creature kill rewards during Hunter runs, as well as the total for that cycle.

1.5.name: Score Tracker
1.5.author: Henpemaz
1.5.desc: Adds a score tracker to the sleep screen to keep track of your current score during a Hunter run.

1.5.name: Cycle Config
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: Lets you adjust Hunter's limited cycles and change cycle lengths, or remove them altogether.

1.5.name: Carnivore Mod
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Lets you eat corpses with any of the characters, both in Single Player mode and in Arena mode.

1.5.name: Survival
1.5.author: Dual
1.5.desc: Changes how you play the game by giving death serious consequences.

1.5.name: ScavsOut!
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: This mod adds restrictions for how scavengers can interact with shelters or behave inside of them.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Breakable Spears
1.5.author: Nacu
1.5.desc: Adds certain interactions to the game which can cause your spears to break in half.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine and EnumExtender to be installed.

1.5.name: Anti-Snatch-Spears
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: Removes scavenger's ability to steal spears off of Hunter's back.

1.5.name: DislodgeSpears
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Adds a custom button that allows you to dislodge spears that are stuck in the terrain.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Arena Back Spears
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Allows you to have a back spear in arena. Works for all four characters.

1.5.name: Lycanthrope
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: If you have a spear on your back as hunter, as soon as you throw an item, the back spear will be shifted to the empty hand.

1.5.name: Infinite Exploding Spear
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Makes the exploding spear item not destroy itself after it explodes.

1.5.name: InfiniteSpears
1.5.author: SchuhBaum
1.5.desc: Every character can place a spear on their back, and with a spear on your back, you can infinitely spawn or despawn spears.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Spear Swallow Mod
1.5.author: Partially Sliced Bread
1.5.desc: Allows Slugcat to perform the impossible and swallow spears.

1.5.name: Swallow Anything
1.5.author: drWoof
1.5.desc: Lets you swallow anything. Even living creatures!

1.5.name: DamageConfig
1.5.author: Pinecubes
1.5.desc: Allows you to customize the amount of damage that spears and rocks do.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: Don't Grab the Bats
1.5.author: Snailturtle
1.5.desc: Makes you not automatically grab batflies when you have an empty hand.

1.5.name: Hunter Starts In Outskirts
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: An alternative start for Hunter in the same room as the other two slugcats. You will spawn with the neuron and the pearl.

1.5.name: Peace Among Friends
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Makes tamed lizards and creatures with really high reputation not attack each other.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: CentiShields
1.5.author: Dual
1.5.desc: When a centipede's shell breaks off, it can become an item you can pick up and use as a shield.
1.5.req: Requires Enum Extender to be installed.

1.5.name: Water Blobs
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: A new creature that bounces around, eats batflies, and bursts into edible pieces when killed. For use in custom regions.
1.5.req: Requires Publicity Stunt, Enum Extender, Sandbox Unlock Core, and Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: Buffed Creatures
1.5.author: ComboPyro
1.5.desc: Changes the attributes of many creatures in the game, generally making them tougher and more intimidating.

1.5.name: No Lizard Bite RNG
1.5.author: Dual
1.5.desc: Lizard bites deal consistent damage instead of killing the player randomly. You can configure the specifics with ConfigMachine.

1.5.name: Little Lizards
1.5.author: ratrat44
1.5.desc: Makes lizards small and adorable!

1.5.name: AntLizard
1.5.author: Rᵒᵗᵗᶦⁿᵍ ᶦⁿ ʰᵉCK, Fyre, Bee
1.5.desc: Gives all lizards the antennas and communication abilities that yellow lizards have.

1.5.name: RainbowLizards
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Makes all of the lizards in the game flashing rainbow colored with many dangerous abilities.

1.5.name: Courage the Cowardly Mouse
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Changes lantern mice so that they are no longer afraid of the player.

1.5.name: Noot Army
1.5.author: Woodensponge
1.5.desc: Killing a small noodlefly will result in a swarm of angry big noodleflys heading towards your location with malicous intent.

1.5.name: Super Jetfish
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Makes it possible to nyoom with jetfish at even more extreme speeds.

1.5.name: BubbleweedSaver
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Prevents Bubblegrass from being used until you are almost out of breath.

1.5.name: Worm Repellent
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Makes those evil, annoying garbage worms so ashamed of themselves that they'll keep their distance and stop trying to steal your spears.

1.5.name: Friendly Plantlife
1.5.author: Leafcat
1.5.desc: Makes all plants your friends to make your journey easier and less scary! Climb pole plants, touch kelps - they don't care!

1.5.name: AntiWormGrass
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Turns the deadly worm grass into a harmless, mellow background element.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: Social Distancing
1.5.author: Formal Lizard
1.5.desc: Makes creatures and objects afraid of you, and will defy physics itself to get away.

1.5.name: Shrapnel Nukes
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Adds six tiers of exponentially multiplying bombs for use in things that require exponentially multiplying bombs.
1.5.req: Requires Publicity Stunt, Enum Extender, Sandbox Unlock Core, and Config Machine to be installed.

1.5.name: CrazyWeapons
1.5.author: HelloThere
1.5.desc: Adds a series of absurdly overpowered weapons to the game to mess around with.

1.5.name: Silly Sounds With Larry
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Pitch modulates all of the sound effects in the game over time.

1.5.name: Mushcat
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Allows you to toggle the time-slow effect from mushrooms on/off at any time by tapping the map button.
1.5.req: Requires Rusty Machine to be installed.

1.5.name: One Hand
1.5.author: Pastebee
1.5.desc: Makes all two-handed items carryable with only one hand.

1.5.name: Splat Cat
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Makes the player squishy.

1.5.name: FestiveWorld
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Gives almost all creatures a Santa hat!

1.5.name: OnO Face
1.5.author: Raggedy_Muffinz
1.5.desc: Gives slugcat a new face.
1.5.req: Requires Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: Missing Geometry Bug Fixes
1.5.author: Bwarch
1.5.desc: Fixes a few locations in the game that have missing geometry or visuals for things that are meant to be in the game.

1.5.name: Restart Always Enabled
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: A small hook mod that will always make the restart game check available

1.5.name: DeathRain
1.5.author: Nacu
1.5.desc: Disables your ability to view the cycle timer along with increasing intensity of the rain, making it more dangerous.

1.5.name: DryWorld
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Removes rain from the game so all cycles are infinite length.

1.5.name: Max Rain Timer
1.5.author: Sycamorph & Pastebee
1.5.desc: Removes RNG from the Rain Timer so that all cycles are the maximum duration.

1.5.name: Random Rain
1.5.author: Formal Lizard
1.5.desc: Extends the range of possible cycle times, so that there's a chance to get shorter cycles than usual.

1.5.name: Clear Water
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Makes all water in the game crystal clear.

1.5.name: Speed
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: A challenge mode where you cannot stop moving. If slugcat stays still for more than 5 seconds, an explosive death awaits.

1.5.name: Auto Destruction Mod
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Makes you explode after you die, hopefully you will feel a bit better.

1.5.name: SelfDestructButton
1.5.author: SchuhBaum
1.5.desc: When grabbed by an enemy, the player can kill slugcat by holding the grab button.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed.

1.5.name: A Quiet World
1.5.author: Bwarch and Garrakx
1.5.desc: Removes all threat music from the game, making encounters more surprising and threats harder to detect.

1.5.name: Action World
1.5.author: Formal Lizard
1.5.desc: Upon entering any room, creatures will spawn, and the room cannot be exited until they are all slain.

1.5.name: Panopticon
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Makes all creatures in the region know your location, and makes them chase after you always.

1.5.name: Multiplier
1.5.author: Formal Lizard
1.5.desc: Allows configuring a multiplier value that multiplies the number of creatues that spawn in the world.

1.5.name: Sickness Mode
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Forces slugcat to always be in starvation mode. More food is needed, and slugcat will have trouble staying conscious. This mod takes effect even in arena mode.

1.5.name: LightGiver
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Encourages the Overseer to shine light on you in dark areas whenever you have a lantern in your stomach.

1.5.name: Triggered
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Makes snails always triggered and ready to pop.

1.5.name: Dethland
1.5.author: Fyre
1.5.desc: Makes all regions completely sterile by preventing any creatures from spawning.
1.5.req: Requires Rusty Machine to be installed.

1.5.name: DeathFix
1.5.author: Abstractor & Fyre
1.5.desc: Fixes the bug where creatures can get permanently stuck in their dens after being injured.

1.5.name: Flatmode Fix
1.5.author: AndrewFM
1.5.desc: Fixes the bug that causes the game to crash on the hibernation screen when playing with flatmode.txt.

1.5.name: Arena Corruption Fix
1.5.author: Willburd & Pastebee
1.5.desc: Fixes the crash that prevents creating or using arena maps that have the Corruption object in them.

1.5.name: Quick Travel Mod
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Allows you to choose any specific region to spawn in when you load your save file, or start a new game.

1.5.name: The Root
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: A new region expanding on Subterranean, and The Exterior, with all new rooms. Made to give exploration focused players more Rain World to discover.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: UwU Mod
1.5.author: Henpemaz
1.5.desc: De UwU Mod twanswates aww of de text in Wain Wowwd into de much supewiow UwU wanguage, incwuding menyus, usew intewface and in-game diawogues! >w<

1.5.name: West Virginia
1.5.author: Empathy Module
1.5.desc: Changes the name of Farm Arrays to West Virginia.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix to be installed.

1.5.name: Australia
1.5.author: DryCryCrystal
1.5.desc: Changes the name of The Exterior to Australia.
1.5.req: Requires Checksum Fix and Custom Assets to be installed.

1.5.name: More Slugcats Dating Sim
1.5.author: Nyamui, Ecnius, Fire-Desu
1.5.desc: Why would someone make this...

1.5.name: Official Level Editor
1.5.author: Joar Jakobsson
1.5.desc: The very powerful and flexible level editor used by the devs to build and render all of the levels in the final game.

1.5.name: Extended Dev Tools
1.5.author: The More Slugcats Team
1.5.author_ext: By AndrewFM and Willburd -- Ported out of MSC by Garrakx
1.5.desc: Enables the built-in dev tools to help with modding the game, and provides a number of new tools and utilities to increase efficiency and quality of life for Rain World modders.

1.5.name: Region Kit
1.5.author: The Substratum Team & Others
1.5.author_ext: By DryCryCrystal, DeltaTime, Henpemaz, Thalber, Thrithralas, Slime_Cubed, Doggo, LeeMoriya, and Kaeporo
1.5.desc: A unified dependency and object kit for Rain World region modding.
1.5.req: Requires EnumExtender and Custom Regions Support to be installed

1.5.name: Realm
1.5.author: Dual
1.5.desc: A user-friendly mod loader that lets you manage your mods in-game.

1.5.name: BepInEx
1.5.author: Various Authors
1.5.desc: A modding framework that allows Rain World to be modded. Install alongside BOI to use hook and patch mods with Rain World.

1.5.name: BOI Mod Manager
1.5.author: Thalber
1.5.desc: GUI mod manager used together with BepInEx for loading mods.
1.5.req: Requires BepInEx to function; can download and install/update BepInEx on demand.

1.5.name: ConfigMachine
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Allows modders to make their own custom configuration settings in an in-game menu. Mods which are configurable require this to be installed.

1.5.name: Checksum Fix
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.desc: Disables checksum verification so that world files and save files can be edited without triggering the game's cheat protection.

1.5.name: AutoUpdate
1.5.author: Pastebee
1.5.desc: Automatically updates other compatible mods when they are enabled (Image by LeeMoriya).

1.5.name: Custom Regions Support
1.5.author: Garrakx
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine and EnumExtender to be installed.
1.5.desc: Lets you install and browse region packs with one click and without modifying the base game's files. It works by automerging the world files at runtime and rerouting accesses to rooms

1.5.name: PublicityStunt
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Changes all private / protected members and functions in the assembly to have public access.

1.5.name: EnumExtender
1.5.author: Pastebee
1.5.desc: Makes certain modifications to the game's code easier.

1.5.name: SlugBase
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: A framework that simplifies adding new characters to Rain World.

1.5.name: Sandbox Unlock Core
1.5.author: the one who screams
1.5.desc: Allows mod makers to effortlessly add new items to Sandbox Mode's item select through hooking.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: Custom Assets
1.5.author: AndrewFM
1.5.desc: Allows extended editing of the game's assets, particuarly texture atlases and music files.

1.5.name: CommunicationModule
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: A utility for supporting translation patches. Allows swapping out any text in the game, adding new languages, and adding new fonts, even with unicode support.

1.5.name: Conditional Effects
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Allows effects placed using Dev Tools to only appear for some slugcats.

1.5.name: Dev Console
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Adds an extensible in-game command console to Rain World inspired by the Source engine.

1.5.name: In-Game Warp Menu
1.5.author: LeeMoriya
1.5.desc: Adds an in-game menu to dev tools that allows you to immediately warp to any room in your current region, or fast travel to other regions.

1.5.name: SapphireTools
1.5.author: SapphireWine
1.5.desc: Adds various utility functionality to the game for testing, such as teleporting to room exits, dragging or manipulating creatures, etc.

1.5.name: Specs Editor
1.5.author: Willburd
1.5.desc: An editor for mapping out collisions for custom props and tiles added to the official level editor. Generates the specs array for the Init.txt file.

1.5.name: Editor Project Image Converter
1.5.author: AndrewFM
1.5.desc: A tool that converts drawn pixel-art images into level editor projects for the official editor. Works for geometry layers and tile material layers.

1.5.name: Prop Renderer
1.5.author: Ongomato
1.5.desc: A scene and rendering workflow for Blender that slices and converts closed meshes into prop sprite sheets that can be used with the official level editor.

1.5.name: Dual Palette Tool
1.5.author: AndrewFM
1.5.desc: Tools that make it possible to use two different color palettes in the same map, at the expense of a reduced color depth in each palette.

1.5.name: Region Baker
1.5.author: Willburd & Garrakx
1.5.desc: Allows you to turn on/off the baking of AI pathmaps into region maps via the presence of a bake.txt file.

1.5.name: Text Encryptor / Decryptor
1.5.author: AndrewFM & Garrakx
1.5.desc: Allows you to encrypt and decrypt the language files used for dialog, pearls, and other conversations in the game.

1.5.name: Input Display
1.5.author: Slime_Cubed
1.5.desc: Adds a customizable on-screen input display. The display updates at the same time as the game, so it can be more precise than an external input display.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Visible ID
1.5.author: ratrat44
1.5.desc: Displays the ID numbers of creatures above their heads. Toggleable with the Tab key.
1.5.req: Requires PublicityStunt to be installed (only if using Partiality).

1.5.name: Debug Sprite Enabler
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Enables toggling on/off different categories of debug visualizations.

1.5.name: GreyScreen
1.5.author: Topicular
1.5.desc: Enables toggling on/off a solid color background mask, to help with chroma keying, useful for recording gifs.
1.5.req: Requires ConfigMachine to be installed

1.5.name: Testing Arenas
1.5.author: ZombieMan101
1.5.desc: Simple arenas made for testing mod mechanics and development, or getting screenshots and gifs.

1.5.name: HokoHub
1.5.author: Houkou
1.5.desc: A utility hub room that provides 12 different pipe connections to other rooms, for quick travel when developing your regions.

1.5.name: Death Protection
1.5.author: Snailturtle
1.5.desc: A semi-god mode tool that disables many sources of death such as drowning, being attacked by creatures, fall damage, etc.

1.5.name: Death Protection 2
1.5.req: Requires Death Protection to be installed
1.5.author: Rᵒᵗᵗᶦⁿᵍ ᶦⁿ ʰᵉCK, Pastebee
1.5.desc: Disables most sources of death for the player, and prevents creatures from dying by falling out of rooms.

1.5.name: Rusty Machine
1.5.author: Zandra
1.5.desc: Core utility functions to help make Partiality mods. This must be installed for certain partiality mods to function properly.

1.5.name: Unofficial Level Editor
1.5.author: AndrewFM & Mikronaut
1.5.desc: An unofficial level editor that allows for limited editing of the pre-existing Rain World levels, such as editing pipe interconnections or changing water levels.

1.01.name: More Slugcats
1.01.author: AndrewFM
1.01.desc: Introduces five new playable slugcats into Rain World, each with their own unique playstyles, abilities, pros and cons.

1.01.name: Buffed Lizards
1.01.author: ComboPyro
1.01.desc: Changes the attributes and abilities of all of the lizards in the game, generally making them tougher and more intimidating.

1.01.name: Side House
1.01.author: AndrewFM
1.01.desc: Adds an entirely new region to Rain World that connects Shoreline, Five Pebbles, and the Depths. It's an amalgamation of many of the map files that went unused in the final game.

1.01.name: Hurricane Mod (v0.2.1)
1.01.author: Mikronaut
1.01.desc: An ultra hard difficulty mode. Less shelters, stricter requirements, and much fiercer creatures and environments.

1.01.name: Alien World: Outskirts
1.01.author: Slugitar
1.01.desc: A revamp for the Outskirts, making the world feel more strange and alien. Come across neurons and leap through the air in zero gravity, calling for precise jumps and tricky gameplay.

1.01.name: Custom Colors
1.01.author: Beau
1.01.desc: Allows you to customize your slugcat's color! Finally you can roam the industrial wastes as a magnificent colored creature.

1.01.name: Spear Rifle
1.01.author: Beau
1.01.desc: Adds an rapid-fire automatic rifle to the game that shoots out spears!

1.01.name: Shoreline Revamp
1.01.author: BushHidden
1.01.desc: Adds big waves, fog, darkness and other cool things to the Shoreline region to make it more visually appealing.

1.01.name: Multiplayer Mode
1.01.author: Omega
1.01.desc: Enables a partially functional, early access version of the multiplayer mode that will be released with the next Rain World update.

1.01.name: DaddySkies
1.01.author: AndrewFM
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of the Sky Islands region, infested with Daddy Long Legs. Features zero gravity and many additional rooms not part of the original Sky Islands region.

1.01.name: DaddyCitadel
1.01.author: Dakras
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of the Shaded Citadel region, infested with Daddy Long Legs.

1.01.name: DaddyGarbage
1.01.author: BushHidden
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of the Garbage Wastes region, infested with Daddy Long Legs.

1.01.name: DaddyExterior
1.01.author: AndrewFM
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of The Leg, Underhang, and the Wall, infested with Daddy Long Legs.

1.01.name: DaddyDrainage
1.01.author: Six Grains of Slugcat
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of the Drainage System region, infested with Daddy Long Legs.

1.01.name: DaddyComplex
1.01.author: BushHidden
1.01.desc: A deadly conversion of the Industrial Complex region, infested with Daddy Long Legs.

1.01.name: Farm Arrays V2
1.01.author: EcoArtz
1.01.desc: Adds Lightburn, Bloom, and other visual effects to the Farm Arrays region.

1.01.name: Sky Islands V2
1.01.author: EcoArtz
1.01.desc: Adds Lightburn, Bloom, and other visual effects to the Sky Islands region.

1.01.name: Chimney Canopy V2
1.01.author: EcoArtz
1.01.desc: Adds Lightburn, Bloom, and other visual effects to the Chimney Canopy region.

1.01.name: Grapecat
1.01.author: Josbird
1.01.desc: Turns Slugcat into Grapecat. Grapecat is strong and can hold two spears at once. He is also a talented spear-swallower, though his methods are a little unorthodox. Plus, he is purple, because purple is the best color.

1.01.name: Moon's Waterproof Shelter
1.01.author: Six Grains of Slugcat
1.01.desc: Makes Moon's room in Shoreline rain-proof and flood-proof, adjusts the palette and adds some new items to make the room more detailed, lively and vibrant. Also Moon needs to be safe because she's the softest being and should be protected.

1.01.name: Unofficial Level Editor
1.01.author: AndrewFM & Mikronaut
1.01.desc: An unofficial level editor made by AndrewFM and Mikronaut. Allows for limited editing of Rain World's levels.

1.01.name: Literally Unplayable
1.01.author: Josbird
1.01.desc:
Cycles are now 10x shorter. Godspeed you magnificent bastard.
Note: only works with pre-made saves.

arenas.name: Broken Pebble
arenas.author: Mojopoop
arenas.req: Requires Arena Corruption Fix to be installed.

arenas.name: Web
arenas.author: Ehsper
arenas.req: Requires Arena Corruption Fix to be installed.
